user.description: Enter your GoTo API credentials. You'll be guided through the OAuth setup process.
user.title: SMS GoTo Configuration

oauth_setup.description: Complete the OAuth flow to authenticate with GoTo
oauth_setup.title: OAuth Setup

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to GoTo API. Please check your credentials and try again.
error.invalid_auth: Invalid authentication credentials. Please verify your API Key, API Secret, and Account SID.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please check the logs for more details.
error.oauth_failed: OAuth authentication failed. Please check your authorization code and try again.
error.token_save_failed: Failed to save authentication tokens. Please try again.

abort.already_configured: SMS GoTo is already configured. You can only have one instance.
